items.title: Pause would be great.
items.content_html:
Sometimes a pause button would be fantastic. There are moments where I just think yes pause please.

Sitting in the garden, weather is just right, can hear animals everywhere enjoying themselves. One beer buzz in. Kids playing a game together taxing their thinking and laughing together. Wife doing some random DIY (she loves that) and well I‚Äôm doing next to nothing just being in the moment.

Pause please.
I think I have a found another use for portrait mode. üç∫ üì∑

items.title: Sir Ken Robinson - New Book
items.content_html:
I‚Äôm a big fan of the approaches Sir Ken Robinson has been taking to education and his commentary chimes with my own thoughts on Education, what it should be and the state of play. Well he has a new book out entitled You, Your Child, And School

This book offers clear principles and practical advice on how to support your child through the K-12 education system, or outside it if you choose to homeschool or un-school

Real social change tends to come from the ground up anyhow, because there‚Äôs a shift in the culture.

Ill be getting myself a copy for sure. If you dont know much about Ken his mantra has been Schools are killing creativity This article give some background links to his 2006 Ted Talk. Things have certainly cermented his argument since then too.

Making is Connecting Second Edition Book out now by @davidgauntlett

Gauntlett offers a terrific account of how creativity, craft, and community intersect in the 21st century. - Clay Shirky

Another reason algorithm timelines are a joke.

Real People Are Turning Their Accounts Into Bots On Instagram ‚Äî And Cashing In

Verified accounts turning themselves into bots. Welcome to the secret underbelly of Instagram.
